EmailTemplate.name: NCS Action Day 2016 - Puzzl Family Fun Day confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your project for NCS Action Day 2016!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
We're very happy to tell you that you have been allocated a place at the Puzzl Family Fun Day event for NCS Action Day 2016, this Saturday 5th March. The details of the event are as follows:
Time: 14:00 - 16:00 Location: Redbridge Central Library, Clements Road, Ilford, IG1 1EA Description: Run by the Barking, Havering & Redbridge Youth Board, Puzzl Family Fun Day is an event that provides a time and place for families to spend quality time together. Come along for a variety of entertaining activities including classic board games, giant Jenga, creative writing & drawing stations. It's a great opportunity to find out about some of the amazing services offered for families, children and young people in your local area! Puzzl - Putting the pieces together for the bigger picture!
IMPORTANT: We expect the project to be very popular so if you turn up late, you may not be able to take part. REMEMBER! If you attend this project, you can collect your FREE ticket to our awesome NCS Action Day 2016 Celebration, from 16:00 - 20:30 at Conway Hall, Holborn, WC1R 4RL.
Here, you'll be able to take part in interactive workshops and stalls with amazing organisations such as ICS, Sport Relief, Bite the Ballot and loads more.
Headlining the event we have I Love Live’s most established discovery Joshua KYEOT and MC Infecta! DJing for the event we have Represent FM’s resident House DJ Lorelle! Click here to find out more! It's going to be a fantastic day, so don't miss out. We can't wait to see you there!
If you have any queries, please reply to this email
See you soon!
The Challenge Society
